name: WIP building game
description:
Build a vehicle for your pilot to get to the water.

The more elements you use the less time you'll have to reach the end and the more your vehicle will weight. 

This game is Work in Progress and Ill be adding art, levels and mechanics in the next couple of weeks/months.

This game is an updated version of an other game I made called InClude:

https://prokischd.itch.io/include

CONTROLS:

Right click to place connections. Right click on the dots to move them. When ready press START to start the simulation.
